thread.title: LittleBigPlanet 3 on PS4 headlines PlayStation Plus February lineup
thread.title_full: LittleBigPlanet 3 on PS4 headlines PlayStation Plus February lineup

title: LittleBigPlanet 3 on PS4 headlines PlayStation Plus February lineup
text:
LittleBigPlanet 3 on PS4 headlines PlayStation Plus February lineup Not A Hero! Starwhal! Ninja Senki DX! More! By Wesley Yin-Poole Published 01/02/2017 
Sony's announces February's lineup of PlayStation Plus games. 
The headline is the PlayStation 4 version of LittleBigPlanet 3, Sony's platformer that revolves around user-creation. 
Super-fast side-scrolling shooter Not A Hero is also available on PS4. 
PS3 owners get Starwhal, and Vita owners get Ninja Senki DX and TorqueL. All three work on PS4 via Cross Buy. Anna: Extended Edition is for PS3 owners only. 
All the games are available to download from 7th February. Games featured in this article
